script.caption: Sunrise breaking over a quaint rural village with blooming crops.

dialogue.text: Nothing’s more fulfilling than harvesting what you sow, eh Sam?

script.caption: A flock of sheep infiltrating a vegetable garden and nibbling away.

dialogue.text: Those damn sheep again! They’re chewing through our livelihood!

script.caption: Chickens pecking away at a perfectly baked pie left to cool off.

dialogue.text: And the chickens have developed quite a sweet tooth. They're threatening our pies now.

script.caption: Pigs on a rampage, digging up tuberous crops.

dialogue.text: The pigs aren't any better, digging up all our taters.

script.caption: A large herd of cattle trampling through the corn field.

dialogue.text: Look at them cattle! Just storming through our corn field.

script.caption: Squirrels gorging on berries from bushes, their cheeks stuffed.

dialogue.text: Even the darn squirrels are joining in. Look at their plump cheeks!

script.caption: Birds swooping down and snatching fruits from trees.

dialogue.text: Birds too! They are snatching our fruits before they can even ripen!

script.caption: Raccoons ransacking the trash cans, leaving litter strewn about.

dialogue.text: And the raccoons, always rummaging in our rubbish.

script.caption: Rabbits happily munching on fields of precious lettuce.

dialogue.text: The rabbits are also doing us no favours. Our lettuce crop is their perspective salad bar.

script.caption: A pack of wolves worrying the sheep by the cliff edge.

dialogue.text: Worse of all, the wolves! Pushing our herd near the cliffs edge, for God's sake!

script.caption: The farmer’s scarecrow lying toppled and chewed up.

dialogue.text: Even our scarecrow hasn't escaped their teeth. There's not much left to scare the crows away.

script.caption: The village’s last grassy patches being devoured by a swarm of locusts.

dialogue.text: As if things weren't dire enough, now locusts have invaded the last of our grassy patches.

script.caption: A forlorn Farmer John and Old Man Sam amidst their destroyed crops.

dialogue.text: We gotta do somethin' Sam. Can't let these critters take over everything.
I agree, John. It's time we take our village back.
